018package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang;
019
020import static java.lang.Boolean.getBoolean;
021import static java.lang.System.out;
022import static java.lang.Thread.currentThread;
023import static java.nio.charset.Charset.defaultCharset;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_IS_TEST;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.internal.SharedFormatter.format;
032
033import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
034import java.io.PrintStream;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
037import java.util.function.Function;
038import java.util.function.Supplier;
039
040import org.apiguardian.api.API;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
044
045/**
046 *  <p>{@summary Some functions for DEBUG and TEST output to the console.}</p>
047 *
048 *  @version $Id: DebugOutput.java 1044 2023-02-04 09:58:19Z tquadrat $
049 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
050 *  @UMLGraph.link
051 *  @since 0.1.0
052 */
053@UtilityClass
054@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: DebugOutput.java 1044 2023-02-04 09:58:19Z tquadrat $" )
055@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
056public final class DebugOutput
057{
058        /*------------*\
059    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
060        \*------------*/
061    /**
062     *  The printer.
063     */
064    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr" )
065    private static Printer m_Printer = out::printf;
066
067        /*------------------------*\
068    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
069        \*------------------------*/
070    /**
071     *  The DEBUG flag.
072     *
073     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG
074     */
075    private static final boolean m_IsDebug;
076
077    /**
078     *  The TEST flag.
079     *
080     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST
081     */
082    private static final boolean m_IsTest;
083
084    static
085    {
086        m_IsDebug = getBoolean( PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG );
087        m_IsTest = getBoolean( PROPERTY_IS_TEST );
088    }
089
090        /*--------------*\
091    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
092        \*--------------*/
093    /**
094     *  No instance is allowed for this class!
095     */
096    private DebugOutput() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( DebugOutput.class ); }
097
098        /*---------*\
099    ====** Methods **==========================================================
100        \*---------*/
101    /**
102     *  If the
103     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
104     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
105     *  is set, execute the given
106     *  {@link Function}
107     *  and write the result to
108     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
109     *
110     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Function} for the output.
111     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
112     *
113     *  @deprecated Use
114     *      {@link #ifDebug(Function, Object...)}
115     *      instead.
116     */
117    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
118    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
119    public static final void debugOutput( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifDebug( supplier, args ); }
120
121    /**
122     *  If the
123     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
124     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
125     *  is set and the given
126     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
127     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
128     *  {@link Function}
129     *  and write the result to
130     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
131     *
132     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
133     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
134     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
135     *
136     *  @deprecated Use
137     *      {@link #ifDebug(BooleanSupplier, Function, Object...)}
138     *      instead.
139     */
140    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
141    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
142    public static final void debugOutput( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifDebug( condition, supplier, args ); }
143
144    /**
145     *  If the
146     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
147     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
148     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
149     *  given
150     *  {@link Function}
151     *  and write the result to
152     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
153     *
154     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
155     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
156     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
157     *
158     *  @deprecated Use
159     *      {@link #ifDebug(boolean, Function, Object...)}
160     *      instead.
161     */
162    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
163    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
164    public static final void debugOutput( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifDebug( condition, supplier, args ); }
165
166    /**
167     *  <p>{@summary If the
168     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
169     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
170     *  is set, a call to
171     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace( out )}
172     *  is made.}</p>
173     *  <p>Use this to get a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
174     *
175     *  @param  e   The exception.
176     *
177     *  @deprecated Use
178     *      {@link #ifDebug(Throwable)}
179     *      instead.
180     */
181    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
182    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
183    public static final void debugOutput( final Throwable e ) { ifDebug( e ); }
184
185    /**
186     *  <p>{@summary This method will find the caller for the method that is
187     *  identified by its name and class, and returns the appropriate stack
188     *  trace element.}</p>
189     *  <p>The return value is
190     *  {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}
191     *  when the provided method is not on the stack trace.</p>
192     *
193     *  @param  methodName  The name of the method that we need the caller for.
194     *  @param  owningClass The class for the called method.
195     *  @return An instance of
196     *      {@link Optional}
197     *      that holds the stack trace element for the caller.
198     */
199    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
200    public static final Optional<StackTraceElement> findCaller( final String methodName, final Class<?> owningClass )
201    {
202        requireNotEmptyArgument( methodName, "methodName" );
203        final var className = requireNonNullArgument( owningClass, "owningClass" ).getName();
204
205        //---* Retrieve the stack *--------------------------------------------
206        final var stackTraceElements = currentThread().getStackTrace();
207        final var len = stackTraceElements.length;
208
209        //---* Search the stack *----------------------------------------------
210        Optional<StackTraceElement> retValue = Optional.empty();
211        FindLoop: for( var i = 0; (i < len) && retValue.isEmpty(); ++i )
212        {
213            /*
214             * This loop searches the stack until it will find the entry for
215             * that matches that for the provided arguments on it. It assumes
216             * then that the next entry on the stack will belong to the caller
217             * for this method.
218             */
219            if( className.equals( stackTraceElements [i].getClassName() ) && methodName.equals( stackTraceElements [i].getMethodName() ) )
220            {
221                if( i + 1 < len ) retValue = Optional.of( stackTraceElements [i + 1] );
222            }
223        }   //  FindLoop:
224
225        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
226        return retValue;
227    }   //  findCaller()
228
229    /**
230     *  If the
231     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
232     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
233     *  is set, call the specified
234     *  {@link Printer}
235     *  to write the given message.
236     *
237     *  @param  message The message; it is a format as defined for
238     *      {@link java.util.Formatter}.
239     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
240     *
241     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
242     */
243    @SuppressWarnings( "StandardVariableNames" )
244    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
245    public static final void ifDebug( final String message, final Object... args )
246    {
247        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
248        {
249            findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
250                .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", format( message, args ), c ),
251                    () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", format( message, args ) ) );
252        }
253    }   //  ifDebug()
254
255    /**
256     *  If the
257     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
258     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
259     *  is set, call the specified
260     *  {@link Printer}
261     *  to write the given message.
262     *
263     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Function} for the output.
264     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
265     *
266     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
267     */
268    @SuppressWarnings( "StandardVariableNames" )
269    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
270    public static final void ifDebug( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
271    {
272        if( m_IsDebug )
273        {
274            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
275            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
276            {
277                findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
278                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
279                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message ) );
280            }
281        }
282    }   //  ifDebug()
283
284    /**
285     *  If the
286     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
287     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
288     *  is set and the given
289     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
290     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
291     *  {@link Function}
292     *  and call the specified
293     *  {@link Printer}
294     *  to write result.
295     *
296     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
297     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
298     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
299     *
300     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
301     */
302    @SuppressWarnings( "StandardVariableNames" )
303    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
304    public static final void ifDebug( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
305    {
306        if( m_IsDebug && requireNonNullArgument( condition, "condition" ).getAsBoolean() )
307        {
308            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
309            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
310            {
311                findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
312                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
313                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message ) );
314            }
315        }
316    }   //  debugOutput()
317
318    /**
319     *  If the
320     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
321     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
322     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
323     *  given
324     *  {@link Function}
325     *  and call the specified
326     *  {@link Printer}
327     *  to write the result.
328     *
329     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
330     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
331     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
332     *
333     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
334     */
335    @SuppressWarnings( "StandardVariableNames" )
336    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
337    public static final void ifDebug( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
338    {
339        if( m_IsDebug && condition )
340        {
341            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
342            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
343            {
344                findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
345                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
346                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message ) );
347            }
348        }
349    }   //  ifDebug()
350
351    /**
352     *  <p>{@summary If the
353     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
354     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
355     *  is set, a call to
356     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace()}
357     *  is made.}</p>
358     *  <p>Use this to provide a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
359     *
360     *  @param  e   The exception.
361     *
362     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
363     */
364    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
365    public static final void ifDebug( final Throwable e )
366    {
367        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( e ) )
368        {
369            m_Printer.print( "DEBUG: " );
370            final var bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
371            e.printStackTrace( new PrintStream( bos, true, defaultCharset() ) );
372            m_Printer.println( bos.toString() );
373        }
374    }   //  ifDebug()
375
376    /**
377     *  If the
378     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
379     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
380     *  is set, call the specified
381     *  {@link Printer}
382     *  to write the given message.
383     *
384     *  @param  message The message; it is a format as defined for
385     *      {@link java.util.Formatter}.
386     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
387     *
388     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
389     */
390    @SuppressWarnings( "StandardVariableNames" )
391    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
392    public static final void ifTest( final String message, final Object... args )
393    {
394        if( m_IsTest && nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
395        {
396            findCaller( "ifTest", DebugOutput.class )
397                .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST - %2$s: %1$s%n", format( message, args ), c ),
398                    () -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST: %s%n", format( message, args ) ) );
399        }
400    }   //  ifDebug()
401

404     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}

406     *  is set, execute the given
407     *  {@link Function}
408     *  and call the specified
409     *  {@link Printer}
410     *  to write the result.
411     *

416     */

418    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
419    public static final void ifTest( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
420    {
421        if( m_IsTest )
422        {
423            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
424            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
425            {
426                findCaller( "ifTest", DebugOutput.class )
427                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
428                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST: %s%n", message ) );
429            }
430        }
431    }   //  ifTest()

433    /**
434     *  If the
435     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
436     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
437     *  is set and the given
438     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
439     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
440     *  {@link Function}
441     *  and call the specified
442     *  {@link Printer}
443     *  to write the result.
444     *
445     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
446     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
447     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
448     *
449     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
450     */
451    @SuppressWarnings( "StandardVariableNames" )
452    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
453    public static final void ifTest( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
454    {
455        if( m_IsDebug && requireNonNullArgument( condition, "condition" ).getAsBoolean() )
456        {
457            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
458            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
459            {
460                findCaller( "ifTest", DebugOutput.class )
461                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
462                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST: %s%n", message ) );
463            }
464        }
465    }   //  ifTest()
466
467    /**
468     *  If the
469     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
470     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
471     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
472     *  given
473     *  {@link Supplier}
474     *  and call the specified
475     *  {@link Printer}
476     *  to write the result.
477     *
478     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
479     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
480     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
481     *
482     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
483     */
484    @SuppressWarnings( "StandardVariableNames" )
485    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
486    public static final void ifTest( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
487    {
488        if( m_IsDebug && condition )
489        {
490            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
491            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
492            {
493                findCaller( "ifTest", DebugOutput.class )
494                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
495                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST: %s%n", message ) );
496            }
497        }
498    }   //  ifTest()

500    /**
501     *  <p>{@summary If the
502     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
503     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
504     *  is set, a call to
505     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace()}
506     *  is made.}</p>
507     *  <p>Use this to get a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
508     *
509     *  @param  e   The exception.
510     *
511     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
512     */
513    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
514    public static final void ifTest( final Throwable e )
515    {
516        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( e ) )
517        {
518            m_Printer.print( "TEST: " );
519            final var bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
520            e.printStackTrace( new PrintStream( bos, true, defaultCharset() ) );
521            m_Printer.println( bos.toString() );
522        }
523    }   //  ifTest()
524
525    /**
526     *  Returns the DEBUG flag.
527     *
528     *  @return {@code true} if the DEBUG flag is set, {@code false} otherwise.
529     *
530     *  @see CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG
531     */
532    public static final boolean isDebug() { return m_IsDebug; }
533
534    /**
535     *  Returns the TEST flag.
536     *
537     *  @return {@code true} if the TEST flag is set, {@code false} otherwise.
538     *
539     *  @see CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST
540     */
541    public static final boolean isTest() { return m_IsTest; }
542
543    /**
544     *  <p>{@summary Assigns the
545     *  {@link Printer}
546     *  for the DEBUG/TEST output.}</p>
547     *  <p>The default implementation writes to
548     *  {@link System#out}.</p>
549     *
550     *  @param  printer The printer
551     */
552    public static final void setPrinter( final Printer printer )
553    {
554        m_Printer = requireNonNullArgument( printer, "printer" );
555    }   //  setPrinter()
556
557    /**
558     *  If the
559     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
560     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
561     *  is set, execute the given
562     *  {@link Function}
563     *  and write the result to
564     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
565     *
566     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
567     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
568     *
569     *  @deprecated Use
570     *      {@link #ifTest(Function, Object...)}
571     *      instead.
572     */
573    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
574    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
575    public static final void testOutput( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifTest( supplier, args ); }
576
577    /**
578     *  If the
579     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
580     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
581     *  is set and the given
582     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
583     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
584     *  {@link Function}
585     *  and write the result to
586     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
587     *
588     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
589     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
590     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
591     *
592     *  @deprecated Use
593     *      {@link #ifTest(BooleanSupplier, Function, Object...)}  }
594     *      instead.
595     */
596    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
597    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
598    public static final void testOutput( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifTest( condition, supplier, args ); }
599
600    /**
601     *  If the
602     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
603     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
604     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
605     *  given
606     *  {@link Supplier}
607     *  and write the result to
608     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
609     *
610     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
611     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
612     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
613     *
614     *  @deprecated Use
615     *      {@link #ifTest(boolean, Function, Object...)}
616     *      instead.
617     */
618    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
619    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
620    public static final void testOutput( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifTest( condition, supplier, args ); }
621
622    /**
623     *  <p>{@summary If the
624     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
625     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
626     *  is set, a call to
627     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace( out )}
628     *  is made.}</p>
629     *  <p>Use this to provide a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
630     *
631     *  @param  e   The exception.
632     *
633     *  @deprecated Use
634     *      {@link #ifTest(Throwable)}
635     *      instead.
636     */
637    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
638    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
639    public static final void testOutput( final Throwable e ) { ifTest( e ); }
640}
